Package de.iabg.mesh

Interface Summary
GeometryReader This interface declares basic functionality for parsing a file containing geometric data, namely nodes, edges, triangles, and quadrilaterals.
KeyReader This interface declares basic functionality for parsing a file containing subsets of node names.
MeshConnectionModel This interface declares basic functionality for geometrically connecting two Finite Element Model meshes.
MeshConnectionReader This interface declares basic functionality for parsing a file containing geometric connection data between two geometric models, namely node connections.
MeshConnectionUI This interface declares basic functionality for the user interface of a JMeshConnectionPanel.
MeshConnectionWriter This interface declares basic functionality for writing a file containing geometric connection data, namely node connections.
MeshModel This interface declares basic functionality for storing data for a Finite Element Model mesh.
MeshUI This interface declares basic functionality for the user interface of a JMeshPanel.
 

Class Summary
DefaultMeshConnectionModel This implementation of MeshConnectionModel attempts to create all the functionality described in the MeshConnectionModel class description.
DefaultMeshModel This implementation of MeshModel attempts to create all the functionality described in the MeshModel class description.
JMeshConnectionFrame A JFrame for a rigidly-connected JMeshConnectionPanel.
JMeshConnectionPanel An implementation for performing a geometrical connection of two Finite Element Mesh panels.
JMeshPanel An implementation of a Finite Element Mesh panel.
NodeConnectionMatrix This Matrix is designed to store a connection or mapping between two objects of NodeMatrix.
NodeCorrelationMatrix This Matrix is designed to store the values of a correlation between all nodes of two objects of NodeMatrix.
NodeMatrix This Matrix is designed to store the nodal coordinates of a given geometry.
RigidMeshConnectionModel This implementation of MeshConnectionModel extends a DefaultMeshConnectionModel to create a rigid connection.
